name: JCEKS Keystore File
summary: Learn about .JCEKS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: JCEKS files may be used to verify an Android app developer when publishing an app or sending out updates. It also may be used to encrypt SSLs. The file requires a password to be accessed.
NOTE: The JCEKS format is similar to the JKS format used by JKS files but uses Triple DES encryption for stronger protection.

description: Keystore file saved in the Java Cryptography Extension KeyStore (JCEKS) format; used as an alternative keystore to the Java Keystore (JKS) format for the Java platform; stores encoded keys and certificates that are referenced by a Java program.
